mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM ID_CARD WHERE name = #{name} AND id_card_number = #{idCardNumber})
SELECT id_card_id, member_id, id_card_number, name, issued_date, address, image_url, created_at, updated_at FROM ID_CARD WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT m.name, ic.address, ic.image_url AS imageUrl, ic.id_card_number AS idCardNumber, ic.issued_date AS issuedDate FROM ID_CARD ic INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON ic.member_id = m.member_id WHERE ic.member_id = #{memberId}
